author: DistroTube
description:
On this edition of HEY DT:

0:00 Intro
0:19 Why not have a look at Nobara?
1:32 You showed how to swap out sudo with doas, but you didn't tell us why we should do this.
3:22 Am I you or are you me?
4:43 Have you considered hooking into the tail end of archinstall and applying all your non-installation configurations at the end?
7:31 I am very glad to hear your plan to create a "video man pages" project.
9:17 Absolutely love this! Would be great if you also add an option for Artix linux repos to turn DTOS to an artix-based distro as well.
11:49 Without the news, I wouldn't know what's really going on.
15:57 I agree we need to reduce doomscrolling but I think the opposite is as dangerous when people have NO idea what's going on the world.
24:34 Thanks to Patrons

W
title: Hey, DT! Without The Internet, I Wouldn't Know What's Going On!
